review: I'm a longtime Roku user with experience all generations of the Roku up to Roku 3 (the puck).  The Amazon Fire TV stick is an incredible value at $39, although I paid only $20 as an Amazon Prime member.  The layout is very nice and professional compared to Roku -- better than Roku with better click and scroll experience (with the Fire TV).  There are lots of extra features including my favorite -- being able to click for more details about the actors in the current scene.  I did find that this feature was somewhat buggy.Roku has more content but a lot of the content is crap.  I have yet to explore all of the content available for Fire TV but the major 3 are there:  Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu Plus.
